content.description: Join AWS for an update on AWS Serverless releases in the last six months and learn how they can empower customers to build cloud native modern applications that drive business agility.
Tom McLaughlin interviews Ben Bridts

content.event: Introduction to Serverless: do you need a PhD to build a cloud app?
content.description: Learn the best ways to get started with your serverless development journey and why serverless computing is changing the cloud landscape.

content.event: How Vonage Reduces Troubleshooting Time and Deploys Features 2x Faster with Epsagon
content.description: As microservices-based applications become more and more complex, the lack of end-to-end visibility can make it difficult to discover and solve issues quickly.
In this talk, AWS Data Hero and author of the DynamoDB Book, Alex DeBrie, breaks down what makes DynamoDB's abstractions uniquely powerful for your cloud-native applications.
Join to hear Yan Cui speak about building a social media site with Lambda, DynamoDB and AppSync and receive pro-tips for implementing DynamoDB in serverless applications from Alex Debrie.

content.event: AWS Step Functions: Workflows for serverless apps and more
content.description: In this session, an AWS Solutions Architect will walk you through designing workflows for serverless and instance-based apps, and will show you how to use Step Functions.
Tom McLaughlin interviews AWS Serverless Hero Ant Stanley

content.event: AWS Serverless-First Function - Serverless for your Organization
content.description: Learn real-world tactics for transforming your organization to get the most out of the cloud.

content.event: Webinar: How to Architect Cost-Efficient Serverless Infrastructures
content.description: Spring has sprung, and what better time to spring clean your AWS cloud bill of the unnecessary spend. Let's start from architecting more cost-efficient infrastructures.
Tom McLaughlin interviews Neosperience CTO Luca Bianchi
Marek Kuczynski and Uri Segev will introduce event-driven architecture before doing a deep dive on serverless security. Backup link: https://app.chime.aws/meetings/1004998757

content.event: Nordic Serverless - Alexa, who's ringing my doorbell?
content.description: Join us for a meetup where Goran Vuksic and Gunnar Grosch will build a serverless Alexa skill with facial recognition using an IoT device and AWS services.
Serverless Deployments with Canary (Nicole Yip from Lego) Servers are dead! How architecture in the 2020s is being revolutionised by serverless (Matthew Clark)

content.description: Tom McLaughlin interviews DevRel at http://begin.com Paul Chin Jr.
